detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract CoreFinance12 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinance12.sol#74-92) has payable functions:
	 - CoreFinance12.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinance12.sol#87-89)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
